mapper.select: (select M.codigo as codigo, M.nombre as nombre, M.descripcion as descripcion, M2.codigo as preReq_codigo, M2.nombre as preReq_nombre, M2.descripcion as preReq_descripcion, null as coReq_codigo, null as coReq_nombre, null as coReq_descripcion from Materia M, Materia M2, Prerequisito P WHERE M.codigo=#{codigo} and P.Materia_id=M.codigo and P.Programa_id=#{id_p} and P.Materia_id_pre=M2.codigo ) UNION (select M.codigo as codigo, M.nombre as nombre, M.descripcion as descripcion, null as preReq_codigo, null as preReq_nombre, null as preReq_descripcion, M3.codigo as coReq_codigo, M3.nombre as coReq_nombre, M3.descripcion as coReq_descripcion from Materia M, Materia M3, Corequisito C WHERE M.codigo=#{codigo} and ( C.Materia_id=M.codigo and C.Programa_id=#{id_p} and C.Materia_id_CO=M3.codigo )or( C.Materia_id=M3.codigo and C.Programa_id=#{id_p} and C.Materia_id_CO=M.codigo ) );

select M.codigo as codigo, M.nombre as nombre from Asignatura A, Materia M, Asign_Mater AM WHERE M.codigo=AM.Materia_codigo and AM.Asignatura_id=A.id and A.posgrado_id=#{id_programa} Order By M.nombre asc;

select M.codigo as codigo, M.nombre as nombre, MP.cohorte as cohorte, c_.totClases as totClases, c_.totHoras as totHoras,
A.id as asignatura_id, A.nombre as asignatura_nombre,
P.id as profesor_id, P.nombre as profesor_nombre,
C.id as clase_id, C.fecha as clase_fecha, c.horaFin as clase_horaFin, CONCAT(Extract(hour from fecha),' a ',Extract(hour from horaFin)) as clase_rangoHoras, C.mater_perio_materia_id as clase_mater_perio_materia_id, C.mater_perio_cohorte as clase_mater_perio_cohorte from Mater_Perio MP inner join ( select Mater_Perio_Materia_id, Mater_Perio_cohorte, count(*) as totClases, SUM(Extract(hour from horaFin)-Extract(hour from fecha)) as totHoras from Clase group by Mater_Perio_Materia_id,Mater_Perio_cohorte ) c_ on c_.Mater_Perio_Materia_id=MP.Materia_id and c_.Mater_Perio_cohorte=MP.cohorte, Asignatura A, Materia M, Profesor P, Clase C, Periodo PE, Asign_Mater AM WHERE MP.Materia_id=M.codigo and
M.codigo=AM.Materia_codigo and AM.Asignatura_id=A.id and
P.id=MP.Profesor_id and C.Mater_Perio_Materia_id=MP.Materia_id and C.Mater_Perio_cohorte=MP.cohorte and MP.Periodo_id=PE.id and PE.ano=#{anio} and PE.semestre=#{semestre};
